Good game in many aspects, but just not a great immersive sim, or a great bioshock game.

I remember the days of Infinite being considered the hype of Bioshock medium. When announced, it was expected to be like Bioshock 1 and 2, but far more ambitious. The trailers signified a world which was innocent on the outside, but grim and malicious if you looked too closely. The design commentary and historical significance bordered on a commentary of those times but was also fantastical. 

When the game came out, the hype was too overbearing to require a critical analysis, so many regarded it as the best in the series. This in part had to do with the design trends of shooters during those days, and the star studded cast which managed to do an amazing job with portraying the characters of the story. In fact, the character design is brilliant. You have the overlapping arcs of an ex-soldier trauma-ridden Booker Dewitt with the sheltered but well-meaning elizabeth. Both of them survive in a world of extremists, and come across polar opposites, mysterious friends, exploiters of the weak, and the victims of exploitation. It's actually an amazing story, but a poorly executed game. Does the story fit a bioshock game? Absolutely.

The problems for me revolve around a personal issue with asthetical design, and a well-regarded issue of gameplay. The first is a bit petty but is entirely related to storytelling; the incessant shoehorning of quantum mechanics to explain the bizzare anomalies of Columbia. This applies to everything from the strange post-WW2 guns you use to the minor features; and applies to some of the design liberties used to portray the city. For instance, I think it would have been ultimately better if they leaved out some of the fantastical steampunk elements in lieu of more realistic WW1-style designs of battleships and architecture. If they made the soldiers less like something out of a fantasy game and more out of the somme, then it would make the city of Columbia more believable. 

The other problem with the game is the gameplay in many areas, and alot of people are going to 100% agree with this. From the use of only 2 weapons and bad level design, it's very tiring to move past a linear area, find a secret cipher, and then backtrack to the same linear level to find a code which gives you 2 voxophones. In most other immersive sim games, you would have a large enough level to find secrets and alternative passages, not in infinite. And this to me is the most tiring aspect of the game, Levels like soldiers field or finkton are a set of linear passages and gauntlets with bad pacing.

Overall, excellent story, bad gameplay. And this is mostly due to poor gameplay choices and occasionally bad lore writing.

Якщо зібрались грати в Біошок, то починайте з першої частини і до кінця, з усіма доповненнями. Особливо, якщо подобається хороша історія, бо всі три гри пов'язані, хоч це і стає зрозуміло тільки в кінці третього DLC до Біошок Інфініт :-)

Un juego visualmente hermoso, con historia que no decepciona y que te mantiene totalmente entretenido, la IA de Elizabeth es excelente, no es un acompañante inútil como en otros casos pues nos ayuda dándonos dinero, munición, salud y sales, es un personaje totalmente vivo y su personalidad te hace encariñarte de ella, definitivamente este es el mejor juego de la franquicia y el final perfecto para la misma.
Super recomendado, me tuvo entretenido todo el juego y tanto la historia como lo visual excelente mi pana, compralo vale la pena
the initial setting is different than the other bioshock games, and more religious, but no less engaging. The games are, truthfully, not very similar, but still fun

终于通关了，在顺手买了生化奇兵50的包后一直在吃灰，想起来努力努力通个关，结果明明十三个小时，却好像打了半年的样子（虽然在宿舍懒得开网离线打的时间应该也不少），直到最后伊丽莎白纷纷出来将主角溺死，也许是因为早就被透了一脸剧情，也许是坐下来熬了一下午，难免有些烦躁，我并没有明显的感觉有什么特别，但总有股淡到难以察觉的悲伤始终萦绕在空气之中……
向伊丽莎白这位游戏史中最好的伙伴致敬！！！

"I told you they'd come."
"No, you didn't."
"Right. I was going to tell you they'd come."
"But you didn't."
"But I don't."
"You sure that's right?"
"I was going to have told you they'd come?"
"No."
"The subjunctive?"
"That's not the subjunctive."
"I don't think the syntax has being invented yet."
"It would have had to have had been."
"Had to have... had... been? That can't be right."

Эта игра мне запомнится надолго.

В целом нормальный, незамысловатый коридор с бодрым сюжетом и незамысловатой прокачкой оружия/умений.
Жалко не раскрыли историю близнецов и не добавили более харизматичных боссов как большие папочки из прошлых частей.
А так норм игра, своих денег (в пределах 500р) стоит.

Это потрясающая игра!
Сюжет мега интересный, а от концовки я буквально о***л...
Графика в игре очень приятная, а визуальная составляющая заставляет просто бродить и любоваться.
Стрельба приятная, не выдающаяся конечно, но приятная.
Помимо пострелять, можно уничтожать всех и вся способностями, которые очень помогают в бою (проходил на высокой сложности (помимо высокой есть так же 1999, которая открывается после прохождения на высокой, но на ней дела обстоят уверен так же), и в некоторых моментах без способностей никак).
В корни меняющем геймплей стало нововведение аэротроссов, которые добавляют безумную динамику, особенно в последних схватках.
Атмосфера невероятная.
Музыка играющая на фоне отлично дополняет атмосферу.
Элизабет, Элизабет - она шикарна. Она прям пуси пуси!!!
ОДНОЗНАЧНО КУПИ!!!
